specifications.Care Advice: Regenerated > Viscose Rayon This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out.
